body_html:
The DataType definition calls out that

DT_BFLOAT16 = 14;  // Float32 truncated to 16 bits.  Only for cast ops.

You could use an artificially less precise Float32 to emulate 16 bits for the time being.
body_text:
The DataType definition calls out that
DT_BFLOAT16 = 14;  // Float32 truncated to 16 bits.  Only for cast ops.

You could use an artificially less precise Float32 to emulate 16 bits for the time being.
body:
The `DataType` definition calls out that 

```
DT_BFLOAT16 = 14;  // Float32 truncated to 16 bits.  Only for cast ops.
```

You could use an artificially less precise Float32 to emulate 16 bits for the time being.
